## RestApplication.(constructor)

Create a REST application with the given parent context

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(parent: Context);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parent | <code>Context</code> | Parent context |
